properties.entry: SELECT EMP_ID, EMP_NAME, EMP_NO, EMAIL, PHONE, DEPT_CODE, JOB_CODE, SAL_LEVEL, SALARY, BONUS, MANAGER_ID, HIRE_DATE, ENT_DATE, ENT_YN FROM EMPLOYEE
SELECT EMP_ID, EMP_NAME, EMP_NO, EMAIL, PHONE, DEPT_CODE, JOB_CODE, SAL_LEVEL, SALARY, BONUS, MANAGER_ID, HIRE_DATE, ENT_DATE, ENT_YN FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMP_ID = ?
INSERT INTO employee (EMP_ID, EMP_NAME, EMP_NO, JOB_CODE, SAL_LEVEL) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
